2164.subject: ISSM
2164.descrlong:
ISSM seniors produce and publicly present an integrated capstone project that displays their cumulative learning in the major and their depth study.  Students also compile a portfolio that integrates their course-based and experiential learning including service learning, internships, field studies, and/or coursework, as this has developed throughout the major.  Required of all ISSM students in their final semester.

[Prereq: (ISSM 300 and ISSM 399) and (Senior Standing) and 24 units of Depth Study Work]
